The anti-b quark -5(0) is spectator ) The outgoing Partons are W- -24(2) and top 6 (1) ) The top 6(1) decays to W 24(3) and b 5(4). Then, W 24(3) goes to anti-muon -13(7) and neutrino 14(8). ) The W- -24(2) goes to s 3(5) cbar -4(6) )

)
